attributes.action: Recognise that the age stipulation of apprenticeships is technically illegal under the age law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time to recognise that under the age law the age stipulation of apprenticeships is technically ilegal. Apprenticeships and training should be available to all, not just a particular age group. Because under the age law no unemployed person should be denied training on the grounds of age, in the way that the Hampshire & Isle of Wight Learining Skills Council and Basingstoke's Key Training do.

rejection.details: You should request a specific action, such as making apprenticeships and training available for all, rather than "recognition".
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
